title: 820-2375-Ano picture only beeping
message:
Hello;

I got a macbook air today with the next problem.
when powering it it beeps continiously, and no chime is coming and no picture is showing

where should I start measuring?

thanks.

title: 820-2375-Ano picture only beeping
message: Bad MCP79U, these boards go straight in the trash. Do not attempt to fix these machines, they are garbage.

title: 820-2375-Ano picture only beeping
message:
I need to know more about what the problem is concerning the MCP79U. Is the chip totally dead or a reball can repair the problem? If the Chip totally dead can changing the chip help the problem?
Boards for such macbook are still costy and the customer cannot afford spending 300,-$ for a refubished board.

title: 820-2375-Ano picture only beeping
message: There are no new chips so this cannot be fixed, the end.

title: 820-2375-Ano picture only beeping
message: How can I confirm that the MCP79U is faulty by measuring?

title: 820-2375-Ano picture only beeping
message: You can't. Just take from me that it is. Reball, reflow, replace do whatever you want but this thing is not worth time and effort. Do NOT repair these pieces of shit!
